page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
The following schools were involved with the collection of the data and the writing of the pages:-
{Hetton School}(collating school) {Eppleton Primary School {East Rainton Primary School
Many thanks are due to all the staff and pupils that have given a great deal of time and effort into making the project a success especially those who worked many long hours entering the data onto the computer. Thanks are also due to those people who consented to be interviewed and answered so many questions.
